heading: Today
text: Showers spreading east this morning, becoming localized in NY, this afternoon in VT and NH.

heading: Friday Night
text: Scattered showers giving way to partial clearing.

heading: Saturday
text: Scattered showers from Route 2 northward, mainly over high terrain.
temperature: Upper 50s to lower 70s, north to south

heading: Sunday
temperature: Mid 60s to mid 70s, north to south
